name: PotionTale
description:
PotionTale!

is a story adventure potion merchant management game!

  As the player in this living world where things are always happening. Has to find a way depending on their story to get themselves out there and complete their one true mission!

I am a potion shop manager who happens to have great skills for the trade. Crafting potions, selling potions as well as checking stocks, and supply/ demand for different potions or ingredients. I have to make the most of my time. I have to  explore the world, and make connections to the people. Which in turn will allow me to import and export goods anywhere in this world. There is a skill tree that helps throughout the game, upgrading is very important. I cant stay poor forever.

Potiontale will feature 3 branching story lines, all with different situations per story, and very different world events to overcome.

There will be exploring, scavenging, combat that is different from normal, 4 factions of kings queens princes, and or princesses, skills, action based experience, and much more!

For now please enjoy the demo alpha, and let us know how the game feels so far.

Thanks for playing!!!

Want to stay in touch on updates follow me on twitter!
